item.title: Gluhpy add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "Promise me you'll always remember: You're braver than you believe, and stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think." -- A.A. Milne

item.title: Gluhpy add a quote by A.A. Milne
Gluhpy add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "It is hard to be brave, when you're only a Very Small Animal." -- A.A. Milne

item.title: Gluhpy add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Don't walk behind me; I may not lead. Don't walk in front of me; I may not follow. Just walk beside me and be my friend." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Gluhpy add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "We can never judge the lives of others, because each person knows only their own pain and renunciation. It's one thing to feel that you are on the right path, but it's another to think that yours is the only path." -- Paulo Coelho
